reviewText:
I remember this season like it was yesterday.. It was the season in which the Giants hosted there first playoff game at Giants staduim against the 49ers...

The Giants went 10 and 6 that year and after beating the 49ers in the wild card game came up short to the soon to be Super Bowl XX champs Bears.. The title of the video said it all(Bound for Glory) because the next year the Giants would crush every one on its way to being Super bowl XXI champs...

This Video shows how the Giants built up a team that would become Champs the next season..
